Review.Titre: It’s not the refund you expected!!!
Review.Contenu: As far as I can tell, this is just one extra layer between the seller (that doesn’t want to stand by their products) and the shipper.  You should be suspicious if a company uses this service.  In my case I purchased the insurance for a nice cane.  The package arrived but the merchandise was broken so I filed a claim.  I did receive a refund for the merchandise but I didn’t get a refund for the shipping.  So, I paid $10 for shipping and say $1 for the insurance for absolutely nothing.  Remember, think twice before you decide to put an order into an online company that uses this vendor.

Package arrived damaged. While Shipped refunded the amount of the item itself, I still paid for the taxes, shipping, international shipping, duties.  Additionally, I have not been provided instructions on how to ship the item back.  Disposing of the item myself will be an additional expense at the city dump.  No way to reach the company to discuss further.

Review.Titre: Won’t Buy From Businesses Who Use Shipped
Review.Contenu: This has been a ridiculous, frustrating experience. I purchased something that was shipped using the app, and the item was never rendered to USPS. Shipped issued a refund, but that didn’t include the shield service OR the shipping fee. So I received no product AND no full refund.

Review.Titre: Received my kombucha in a case
Review.Contenu: Received my kombucha in a case, several bottles had been broken In transit. Took a few pictures in the claim & explained, had a new case sent to me within a week. Thank you, will continue to use the shipped services when available with my purchases.

I used Shipped’s app to request assistance to track my delayed parcel.  They emailed me the next day and followed up with locating the parcel.   The following day, upon its delivery when I wasn’t at home, they emailed me again to inform me of its delivery, with photos of its drop off spot and confirmed it was sent to my condo.   Excellent and efficient service.

Review.Titre: No fuss replacement after theft or…
Review.Contenu: No fuss replacement after theft or “missing” package eft in lobby.Refreshing experience.

I ordered some folding knives from Touch of Modern and when they arrived I noticed the blades were bent. I took photos showing the issue and sent them in. Before I knew it the purchase was refunded, amazingly fast. Shipped took prompt action resolving the situation almost to the point of it not happening.

Excellent experience. The lamp was broken when I opened the package, although there was no damage to the box itself. After contacting and submitting the picture, the claim was approved right away, Shipped contacted the seller, and arranged the replacement. Couldn't have gone better than that!

Highly recommend this company. I ordered a replacement part, wire frame, for my airdog X3, and added this insurance. The item arrived damaged. I filed a claim and attached 3 images. New item arrived in a few days. Easy and hassle free process. The item was &69, and the insurance fee was like $0.79. Peace of mind for your shipping.

The first screen cracked after the first start up. It was a defective product. Mobile pixel has agreed to fully replace it. Communication was smooth and supportive. At the of day, that's a good product that greatly improves productivity!
Wrote to company regarding a damaged order and within a day they had approved and gotten me a refund. That is great customer service.

fedex lost/indefinitely delayed my shipment. A waited through the delays for a month or so. I called to resolve the issue to no avail. So I filed a claim with shipped an they quickly issued me a refund and resolved the issue in minutes.
Shipment was damaged and Shipped refunded with no hoops to jump through. Excellent service. I’ll use them always from now on.
They were quickly responsive to refunding me for the damaged packaging and product. I supplied photos, of course. And, the merchant quickly made a new product so i would have it in time for event.
